name: I'mHome
description:
Creative Making:
Advanced Visualisation & Computational Environments How To Play

Use the left and right arrow keys to navigate the game.

Use the mouse to click on objects to interact.

Clickable Objects (for now)

musical instruments + sea view

Objective

I'mHome is my first game development mini project using Unity. It's a prototype flat game that introduces the player to my home country, Lebanon, a small Mediterranean country in the Middle East. The purpose of the game is to counter stereotypical and racist representations of Arab / Middle Eastern countries in the gaming industry.
